overview: With over 40 years experience and 100 Emmy® awards to its credit, NFL® Films combines the latest camera technology with its renowned storytelling prowess to present its most visually arresting film to date: Ultimate NFL®. Using a camera that shoots up to 1,000 frames per second in high-definition, the game is depicted in a richly detailed super slow motion, giving a new perspective to America's Sunday ritual.
title: Ultimate NFL
